definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: The upper eyelid scar was repaired by concealing it in the supratarsal fold naturally.
sentences.chinese: 修復上瞼瘢痕，使瘢痕自然隱蔽在上瞼皺襞中。

sentences.english: Orthotic effects of shape and function of upper eyelids as well as occurrence of complications after the surgery were observed.
sentences.chinese: 觀察術後上瞼形態和功能的矯正效果及併發症的發生。

sentences.english: Conclusion: it showed that tropicamide eyedrops has little influence on mydriasis whether uplifting eyelid of patients or not.
sentences.chinese: 提起上瞼與否對託吡卡胺滴眼液的擴瞳效果影響不大。

sentences.english: This type of ectropion often affects the upper lid.
sentences.chinese: 這種類型的眼瞼外翻，往往影響上瞼。
